casebody.data:
Maria UGALDE, Administratrix (Estate of Richard Ugalde)
v.
SAINT MARY'S HOSPITAL, INC., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 17, 2018

Jeffrey M. Cooper, Bridgeport, in support of the petition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 182 Conn. App. 1, 188 A.3d 787 (2018), is denied.
